subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: Goalie Corey Crawford, who allowed five goals on his glove side Wednesday, drew criticism over his technique but said he did not want to think too much about it before Saturday’s Game 5.
snippet: Goalie Corey Crawford, who allowed five goals on his glove side Wednesday, drew criticism over his technique but said he did not want to think too much about it before Saturday’s Game 5.
